channel.title: What do you guys think?
channel.description: We should make a Music Production section. I just started messing around with Ableton Live and it would be cool if I had a place to get criticism. Who's with me?! Also sorry if this is the wrong section. :P

item.title: What do you guys think?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Those aren’t weapon and cannon sections lol

But anyway, I’m gunna vote no to a section, but you can make a new thread here if you wanna start a music team or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you guys think?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:416324”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=518253.msg3766010#msg3766010 date=1317246857]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=518253.msg3766006#msg3766006 date=1317246580]

Naw but David, I’d be willing to post tutorials and stuff so that other people will get into it too; besides any thing posted on MITB by anyone (MSCP users even more so.) will get flamed.

Every board here is SOMEHOW related to gaming/runescape/rsps, yours isn’t related at all :S
[/quote]That’s actually not true; there is music in RuneScape, games and RSPS’s.
[/quote]There’s also weapons and cannons, should we make boards for those? But there is no singing in RS :P[/quote]Yea, haha. We already have. --> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,129.0.html
A place that I’ve learned to love.

[quote="(Anthony), post:15, topic:416324"]but not shitty gay music done in some shitty program by some dumb kid.[/quote]God, why the fuck has this kid not been banned yet?

Read full topic

item.title: What do you guys think?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:10, topic:416324”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=518253.msg3765996#msg3765996 date=1317246259]

Alright I call making the beat! Who wants to sing and who wants to rap?
It’s gunna be a R&B/Rap/Dubstep/Folk song.

Err… I have a guitar. My amp is Peavey. What can I do?

And I could attempt rap if you have lyrics atm.
[/quote]The guitar is no good unless you have a MIDI Cable that can go into your computer. Make your own rap and I can make a beat around it if you want. :P[/quote]
I should have one laying around somewhere. And keep in mind I’m white, so the rap is automatically 10% worse.

Read full topic

Every board here is SOMEHOW related to gaming/runescape/rsps, yours isn’t related at all :S

item.description:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:416324”]What are some Music Programs like RockBand but that’s for mac and my broke ate shit. Lol[/quote]GarageBand*
There’s FL studio and Ableton Live, FL studio is less professional but I think it’s easier to use. But with AL you can do anything related to sounds.
